name: REDSP3
description: This is a TAS Professional 3.0 command here for compatibility. The preferred method is to use the REDSP command.

parameters.name: screen_buff_num
parameters.description:
This is the screen buffer number. This must resolve to one of the following values:
1-10 - Redisplay entire screen including active windows
21-30 - Redisplay characters and color attributes only
41-50 - Redisplay characters only

comments: This is the equivalent of the TAS Professional 3.0 command Redisplay Screen.
